info.description:
This is a sample server for aigentools-backend.
Authentication: Bearer Token (JWT).
For Apifox/Swagger UI: Click "Authorize", enter "Bearer " followed by your token.
Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
info.title: aigentools-backend API

get.description: Get a paginated list of transactions with filtering. Admin only.
Export transactions to CSV. Admin only.
Get a paginated list of users. Admin only.

delete.description: Delete a user permanently. Admin only.

post.description: Admin strictly increases (credit) or decreases (debit) user balance based on the type field.
Use AI to analyze an image and generate prompts based on a selected template
Log in a user with a username and password
Register a new user with a username and password

get.description: Get STS token for uploading files to Alibaba Cloud OSS
Retrieve a paginated list of AI models with filtering based on user role

post.description: Create a new AI model. Admin only.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all AI models with basic details (excluding parameters).
get.summary: Get list of all AI models (simplified)

put.description: Update AI model details. Admin only.

get.description: Retrieve the parameters of an AI model by its ID.
get.summary: Get AI model parameters by ID

patch.description: Update the status of an AI model. Admin only.

get.description: List tasks with pagination and filtering

post.description: Submit a new task with body and user information

get.description: Get a single task by ID

put.description: Update task input data (only if not yet processing)

patch.description: Approve a pending audit task and push it to the execution queue

post.description: Cancel a task that is pending or processing
Retry a task that has failed
Create a test task and get a fixed task ID back.

data.description: Ensure data is always present, even if nil (will be null in JSON)

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
